mapper.update:
update testModule
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
tId = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tCount = #{tcount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
uId = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

user4 = #{user4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user5 = #{user5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update testModule set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tId = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tCount = #{tcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, uId = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user1 = #{user1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user2 = #{user2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user3 = #{user3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user4 = #{user4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user5 = #{user5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into testmodule (id, name, time, tId, tCount, score, uId, status, user1, user2) values(0,#{name},now(),#{tid},#{tcount},#{score},#{uid},0,#{user1},#{user2})
mapper.select: select count(*) from testmodule where testmodule.`status`=0 and uid=#{uid}
